0.1.0.name: wordpress/admin-bar-backend-search
0.1.0.description:
This plugin requires WordPress 3.3

On the administration you can find different search forms. Some for contents like posts, pages, media or comments. But you have also one for plugins, themes and/or users.

This plugin will centralize all search types into one search form, which is placed in the new Admin Bar. You can change the type via a dropdown menu, take a look at the screenshot.

Does work with network admin too.

Sounds pretty good? Install now!

Feedback

If you want, you can drop me a line @ocean90 on Twitter or @Dominik Schilling on Google+.

More

Try also some of my other plugins or visit my site wpGr
